snippet: The cathedral’s dean said on Wednesday that they wanted to give gay and transgender people “the same tools for living their lives faithfully that straight people have always had.”
abstract: Washington National Cathedral announces it will now hold weddings for same-sex couples; cathedral's step carries weight because of its historic role as nation's unofficial capitol of worship.
lead_paragraph: The cathedral’s dean said on Wednesday that they wanted to give gay and transgender people “the same tools for living their lives faithfully that straight people have always had.”

headline.seo: Washington National Cathedral to Hold Same-Sex Weddings
headline.main: Washington National Cathedral Announces It Will Hold Same-Sex Weddings
headline.print_headline: Washington National Cathedral Announces It Will Hold Same-Sex Weddings

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
